cab.content: m!I(P 789) From Secretary of State to Viceroy, Foreign Department, 31st January 1920.. i Clear the line'. Foreign Secret. Your telegram 11.9 S., dated 29tli January. Afghanistan. I agree that consideration of Amir's letter to King should be deferred pending receiptof his reply to your letter of 17th January. Meanwhile, I think it will be sufficient togive Afghan Envoy formal acknowledgment of receipt of letter.
